name: Firelight First Seal
text: Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by tributing the above cards you control (You do not use "Polymerization"). When this card is Special Summoned: add 1 "Firelight Ritual Site" from your Deck to your hand. If this card leaves the field: You can Special Summon a "Firelight" monster from your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, that monster is treated as a Tuner, and you can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: If you control a face-up "The Firelight"; Once per turn (Quick Effect): you can destroy a card on the field.
